resources.string:
If the Xiaomi device fails to install the Xapk, please follow the steps below:

 1. Open settings - My device - Detailed info and specs
 2. Repeat click "MIUI version" to enable developer options
 3. Return to the main settings page - "Additional settings" - “Developer options”
 4. Disable "Turn on MIUI optimization"
 5. Install

If the Xiaomi device fails to launch app, please follow the steps below:

 1. Uninstall app 2. Open settings - My device - Detailed info and specs
 3. Repeat click "MIUI version" to enable developer options
 4. Return to the main settings page - "Additional settings" - “Developer options”
 5. Disable "Turn on MIUI optimization"
 6. Reinstall
Some systems do not support installing XAPKs, please try updating your phone system
Installation failed, not enough storage space

Starting from Android 11, there are limit on the /Android/obb directory, click OK and click 'USE THIS FOLDER' in the pop-up window.

 If you can't click 'USE THIS FOLDER', create a new folder in the obb directory, the folder name is copied to the clipboard.
 Then open this folder and click 'USE THIS FOLDER'.
Android 13 and above are not supported
